de.slothsoft.charts.internal

Class RefreshListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.charts.internal.RefreshListeners

  • public class RefreshListeners
extends Object
    A class that capsules all the functionality needed to get the RefreshListener to work correctly.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RefreshListeners(Object source)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRefreshListener(RefreshListener listener)
      Adds a refresh listener that is called whenever the source needs to be redrawn by the GUI.
      void fireRefreshNeeded()
      Fires a default event for the RefreshListeners of the source.
      void fireRefreshNeeded(RefreshListener.Event event)
      Fires an event for the RefreshListeners of the source.
      void removeRefreshListener(RefreshListener listener)
      Removes a refresh listener that was called whenever the source needed to be redrawn by the GUI.

      • RefreshListeners

        public RefreshListeners(Object source)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        source - the source of the events; can be null

    • Method Detail

      • fireRefreshNeeded

        public void fireRefreshNeeded()
        Fires a default event for the RefreshListeners of the source.

      • fireRefreshNeeded

        public void fireRefreshNeeded(RefreshListener.Event event)
        Fires an event for the RefreshListeners of the source.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be fired

      • addRefreshListener

        public void addRefreshListener(RefreshListener listener)
        Adds a refresh listener that is called whenever the source needs to be redrawn by the GUI.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener

      • removeRefreshListener

        public void removeRefreshListener(RefreshListener listener)
        Removes a refresh listener that was called whenever the source needed to be redrawn by the GUI. Does nothing if the listener was never added.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener
